title: Delphi Study-Based Educational Framework for Strengthening Health Information Literacy Competencies

context.prior_knowledge: Basic digital literacy and comprehension of instructional methodologies
context.additional_context: Emphasizing digital health information evaluation and instructional design competencies for pre-service and in-service teachers

learning_goals: Learners can present four or more criteria for evaluating the reliability of health information based on WHO's infodemic management strategies.
Learners can design a health information literacy lesson plan reflecting the principles of transparency, inclusivity, and adaptability.
Learners can apply three educational strategies to bridge the digital divide in actual classroom settings.
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
